pull.title: gui: hide HD & encryption icons when no wallet loaded
pull.body:
This PR takes care of removing (hiding) the HD wallet and encryption icons when no wallet is loaded.

Fixes #17927

issue.title: Bugfix: GUI: Hide the HD/encrypt icons earlier so they get re-shown if another wallet is open
issue.body:
To reproduce bug, open 2 wallets, and close 1. You end up left without the HD/encrypt icons, despite having a wallet open still.

This works because the icons are re-shown after we remove the current wallet (if there's another wallet still open).

issue.title: Bitcoin PR tracking
issue.body: The main purpose of this issue is to keep track of Pull Requests on Bitcoin since version 0.19.1 identifying those which make a porting LitecoinZ.

comments.body: This in the wrong place, should be in `BitcoinGUI::removeWallet` - then it will also work if you open the console and call `unloadwallet`.
Just a nit: shouldn't this line be above the comment?
This seems obviously broken... See PR #18007
